details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.7.8 Extension schemas - Extension schema Field type - valueType field
details.description: Field 'valueType' of the PDF/A Field value type in the PDF/A extension schema shall have type Text and namespace prefix 'pdfaField'. Value of valueType property shall be defined.

rule.description: Field 'valueType' of the PDF/A Field value type in the PDF/A extension schema shall have type Text and namespace prefix 'pdfaField'. Value of valueType property shall be defined.

error.message: Field 'valueType' of the PDF/A Field value type is not present, or doesn't have prefix 'pdfaField' (valueType prefix = %1) or doesn't have type Text (isValueTypeValidText = %2) or value of valueType doesn't defined (isValueTypeDefined = %3)
